issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: I've created two certs cert-1 and cert-2 and added two listeners to elb with {code} eulb-create-lb-listeners -l "lb-port=443, protocol=HTTPS, instance-port=8000, instance-protocol=HTTP, cert-id=arn:aws:iam::000249099617:server-certificate/cert-1" test-elb eulb-create-lb-listeners -l "lb-port=444, protocol=HTTPS, instance-port=8000, instance-protocol=HTTP, cert-id=arn:aws:iam::000249099617:server-certificate/cert-2" test-elb {code} Base on the servo.log downloading first cert failed {code} 2015-10-08 22:23:01,006 servo [DEBUG]:(None, '') 2015-10-08 22:23:01,470 servo [DEBUG]:floppy disk mounted on /var/lib/load-balancer-servo/floppy 2015-10-08 22:23:01,555 servo [DEBUG]:floppy disk unmounted on /var/lib/load-balancer-servo/floppy 2015-10-08 22:23:01,638 boto [ERROR]:403 Forbidden 2015-10-08 22:23:01,638 boto [ERROR]:SenderNotAuthorizedThe user not authorized to download certificate8cf618b1-eef0-4041-ae9a-d0e4e06d5c92 2015-10-08 22:23:01,639 servo [ERROR]:failed to download the server certificate: BotoServerError: 403 Forbidden SenderNotAuthorizedThe user not authorized to download certificate8cf618b1-eef0-4041-ae9a-d0e4e06d5c92 2015-10-08 22:23:01,658 servo [DEBUG]:haproxy process restarted 2015-10-08 22:23:01,658 servo [DEBUG]:listener updated 2015-10-08 22:23:11,362 servo [DEBUG]:reported the metrics: 0-0-0-0-0-0-0-0 2015-10-08 22:23:11,737 servo [DEBUG]:access log enabled?: False 2015-10-08 22:23:11,738 servo [DEBUG]:to-add: 1, to-delete: 0 2015-10-08 22:23:11,738 servo [DEBUG]:ProxyCreate action (update haproxy config file) 2015-10-08 22:23:11,746 servo [DEBUG]:(None, '') 2015-10-08 22:23:12,195 servo [DEBUG]:floppy disk mounted on /var/lib/load-balancer-servo/floppy 2015-10-08 22:23:12,251 servo [DEBUG]:floppy disk unmounted on /var/lib/load-balancer-servo/floppy 2015-10-08 22:23:12,355 servo [INFO]:ssl certificate ready for use: arn:aws:iam::000249099617:server-certificate/cert-2 2015-10-08 22:23:12,387 servo [DEBUG]:haproxy process restarted {code} I've later removed this listener and added it back without changing anything in the cert. This time it worker {code} 2015-10-08 22:25:33,869 servo [DEBUG]:(None, '') 2015-10-08 22:25:34,311 servo [DEBUG]:floppy disk mounted on /var/lib/load-balancer-servo/floppy 2015-10-08 22:25:34,368 servo [DEBUG]:floppy disk unmounted on /var/lib/load-balancer-servo/floppy 2015-10-08 22:25:34,469 servo [INFO]:ssl certificate ready for use: arn:aws:iam::000249099617:server-certificate/cert-1 2015-10-08 22:25:34,493 servo [DEBUG]:haproxy process restarted 2015-10-08 22:25:34,494 servo [DEBUG]:listener updated {code}
fields.summary: Intermittent 'The user not authorized to download certificate' in elb vm

comments.body: [~vasya] I presume the two listeners had different lb-port, right? I can't reproduce this problem. Do you have an idea?
[~spark], yes, two different ports. I've seen this once so I am not sure how to reproduce this.
[~vasya] Closing this one as I can't reproduce it after my best-effort. Please re-open if the problem is seen again. thanks!
Changed this to blocker since it effects all SSL connections through ELB.
[~vasya] yes and the root cause was identified. Fix will be put in soon.
[~hspencer] On the package build, if you could create a HTTPS/SSL listener and the HTTPS/SSL works it is resolved.

Fixed.

Eucalyptus Version: {{4.2.1-0.0.24116.75.20151124git2cab29b.el6}}

*Steps*

# Set up 2 Eucalyptus Clouds with Eucalyptus DNS enabled
#* [hspencer-120|http://jenkins.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/job/Quick%20Launch%20Maint-4.2/120/]
#* [hspencer-122|http://jenkins.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/job/Quick%20Launch%20Maint-4.2/122/]
# Used the following file to federate the clouds:
{code}
# cat federated-region.json
{
    "Regions": [
        {
            "CertificateFingerprint": "96:F4:AA:2A:09:D2:14:D1:E0:4A:4E:6D:84:C9:8F:88:96:FC:A3:E5:D6:07:6A:E9:EE:5E:67:CF:2E:9C:03:7D",
            "CertificateFingerprintDigest": "SHA-256",
            "IdentifierPartitions": [
                1
            ],
            "Name": "rick-ross",
            "Services": [
                {
                    "Endpoints": [
                        "http://identity.g-22-07.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/"
                    ],
                    "Type": "identity"
                },
                {
                    "Endpoints": [
                        "http://ec2.g-22-07.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/"
                    ],
                    "Type": "compute"
                }
            ]
        },
        {
            "CertificateFingerprint": "20:D0:32:09:E2:7D:42:A4:AB:39:DC:C5:8C:41:6E:AB:2E:1A:F1:6F:ED:03:8D:BD:74:69:4D:C8:1E:F6:E3:D6",
            "CertificateFingerprintDigest": "SHA-256",
            "IdentifierPartitions": [
                2
            ],
            "Name": "the-weeknd",
            "Services": [
                {
                    "Endpoints": [
                        "http://identity.c-09.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/"
                    ],
                    "Type": "identity"
                },
                {
                    "Endpoints": [
                        "http://ec2.c-09.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/"
                    ],
                    "Type": "compute"
                }
            ]
        }
    ]
}

# euca-describe-regions --region euca-admin@rick-ross
REGION	rick-ross	http://ec2.g-22-07.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
REGION	the-weeknd	http://ec2.c-09.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/

# euca-describe-regions --region euca-admin@the-weeknd
REGION	rick-ross	http://ec2.g-22-07.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
REGION	the-weeknd	http://ec2.c-09.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
{code}
# Create 'development-operations' account:
{code}
[root@a-18 ~]# euare-accountlist --region euca-admin@rick-ross
(eucalyptus)database	000297623636
(eucalyptus)objectstorage	000931571013
engineering	001673742098
(eucalyptus)cloudformation	000638094215
eucalyptus	000567300725
(eucalyptus)imaging	000643003024
(eucalyptus)aws-exec-read	000181008720
(eucalyptus)blockstorage	000538082825
(eucalyptus)loadbalancing	000161670087
development-operations	001858167650
{code}
# Create two server certificates under the 'development-operations' account:
{code}
[root@a-18 ~]# euare-servercertlistbypath --region devops-admin@rick-ross
arn:aws:iam::001858167650:server-certificate/apache-elb-rick-ross
arn:aws:iam::001858167650:server-certificate/nginx-elb-rick-ross
{code}
# Create ELB under 'development-operations' account:
{code}
[root@a-18 ~]# eulb-create-lb -s subnet-2b57c761,subnet-952cd14f -l "lb-port=80, protocol=HTTP, instance-port=80, instance-protocol=HTTP" NginxELBRickRoss --region devops-admin@rick-ross
DNS_NAME	NginxELBRickRoss-001858167650.lb.g-22-07.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com
{code}
# Add additional listeners for each server certificate:
{code}
[root@a-18 ~]# eulb-create-lb-listeners -l "lb-port=443, protocol=HTTPS, instance-port=8000, instance-protocol=HTTP, cert-id=arn:aws:iam::001858167650:server-certificate/apache-elb-rick-ross" NginxELBRickRoss --region devops-admin@rick-ross
[root@a-18 ~]# eulb-create-lb-listeners -l "lb-port=444, protocol=HTTPS, instance-port=8000, instance-protocol=HTTP, cert-id=arn:aws:iam::001858167650:server-certificate/nginx-elb-rick-ross" NginxELBRickRoss --region devops-admin@rick-ross

[root@a-18 ~]# eulb-describe-lbs --show-long --region devops-admin@rick-ross
LOAD_BALANCER	NginxELBRickRoss	NginxELBRickRoss-001858167650.lb.g-22-07.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com			{interval=30,target=TCP:80,timeout=5,healthy-threshold=3,unhealthy-threshold=3}	hood-billionaire,black-dollar	subnet-952cd14f,subnet-2b57c761	vpc-08b39780		{protocol=HTTP,lb-port=80,instance-protocol=HTTP,instance-port=80},{protocol=HTTPS,lb-port=443,instance-protocol=HTTP,instance-port=8000,cert-id=arn:aws:iam::001858167650:server-certificate/apache-elb-rick-ross,{ELBSecurityPolicy-2015-05}},{protocol=HTTPS,lb-port=444,instance-protocol=HTTP,instance-port=8000,cert-id=arn:aws:iam::001858167650:server-certificate/nginx-elb-rick-ross,{ELBSecurityPolicy-2015-05}}				{ELBSecurityPolicy-2015-05}	{owner-alias=001858167650,group-name=default}	{sg-4b62614c}	2015-12-04T15:51:06.86Z	internet-facing
{code}
# After authorizing SSH access, access each ELB instance and checked servo.log:
{code}
[root@a-18 ~]# euca-describe-instances --region elb-admin@rick-ross
RESERVATION	r-f6849dbd	000161670087	default
INSTANCE	i-2fdefb50	emi-1c8aad37	euca-10-116-131-122.eucalyptus.g-22-07.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com	euca-172-31-24-155.eucalyptus.internal	running	elb-admin	0		m1.small	2015-12-04T15:51:13.396Z	hood-billionaire				monitoring-enabled	10.116.131.12	172.31.24.155	vpc-08b39780	subnet-952cd14f	instance-store					hvm		f726c992-ae23-4077-92d2-6749790fbffe_hood-billionaire_1	sg-4b62614c			arn:aws:iam::000161670087:instance-profile/internal/loadbalancer/loadbalancer-vm-001858167650-NginxELBRickRoss	x86_64
